name: Moon teardrop
description:
hi there , over the last 10 days or so ive been turbo developing this game  , for some reason I really felt like doing this ,even more than the other game ive been developing for my own, hope thats cool, in any case , i actually want to turn this into my first steam project.

you can think of it as some kind of megaman game, cuz you like steal the powers from the bosses, if i have enough time i could actually add levels and not having just a boss rush game, things to consider

more or less about half of the graphic assets have been completed even, I just took like 4 days to put together a test level with menus and stuff, 

have some concept art for some of the bosses I want to have in game

i wanna try to fund this game in the super near future, but imma be busy for a while doing other works that are also very important, hope you like this!!
